definition[0]: believing unreasonably that you cannot trust other people, or that they are trying to harm you or have a bad opinion of you
example[0]: Malcolm got really paranoid, deciding that there was a conspiracy out to get him.
example[1]: He has always been paranoid about his personal security.
definition[1]: suffering from a mental illness that makes you believe that other people are trying to harm you
example[2]: a patient suffering from paranoid schizophrenia
